function.name: smartControl-getStatus
function.description: This function is used to check the smart control status of a specific compartment in SmartThings devices.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to check the smart control status.

predefinedCompartment.description: The specific compartment to check the smart control status.
